unnormalised: Folks, let me tell you, running errands at your neighbourhood kirana store is less about shopping and more about advanced mathematics, seasoned with a dash of theatrical performance. Forget your calculators, because the abacus is strong with these guys.

unnormalised: So, I popped down to Sharmaji’s shop yesterday for some 'atta' (flour) and 'dal' (lentils). The price board cheerfully declared atta at Rs. 35/kg. Dal? A cool Rs. 80/kg. “Sharmaji, ek kilo atta aur aadha kilo dal de do (Sharmaji, give me one kg of atta and half a kilo of dal),” I said, feeling like a responsible adult.
